sentences.en: And the Impediment Jinx , spell word Impedimenta, can block someone or something from moving caster.
sentences.cn: 障碍咒的咒语是“障碍重重”, 它能阻止人和东西向施咒这移动.

sentences.en: The two new Death Eaters Impedimenta Harry, Hermione, and Neville.
sentences.cn: 二个新的食死徒向哈利, 赫敏和纳威射出了障碍咒.

trans.tran_cn: 重负，累赘，行李（尤指军队的）
